nodes.text: Sorc Tormo was an Umbaran male crime lord who led the Haxion Brood criminal syndicate.

Merciless and bombastic, Tormo enjoyed watching combat in his fight club on Ordo Eris, the Haxion Brood's space station stronghold. Due to the gambling debts that the pilot Greez Dritus had with the Haxion Brood, Tormo had the former Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis, a companion of Dritus, captured and forced to fight in his arena. Dritus and Cere Junda located Kestis, rescuing him aboard the Stinger Mantis. As Kestis escaped Ordo Eris, Tormo threatened to have the Haxion Brood chase him across the galaxy.
Sorc Tormo was introduced in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, played by Luke Cook.
